Data Science with R by Garrett Grolemund

Learn how to do data science with R. The book is broken down into the following chapters (which you can also access from the icon at the top left):
  • Foundations
  • Data carpentry
  • Data wrangling
  • Data visualization
  • Exploratory data analysis (EDA)
  • Cluster analysis
  • Machine learning
  • Statistical modeling
  • Probability
  • Tests
  • Reproducible reports
  • Interactive reports
